body_html: Note for the future: I see a bunch of extra changes that are not directly related to the implementation of sparse_sum. Changes like this make it harder to review PRs, because the reviewer has to simultaneously review the feature request, as well as the refactorings. Stacking the diffs can help a lot here.

body: Note for the future: I see a bunch of extra changes that are not directly related to the implementation of `sparse_sum`. Changes like this make it harder to review PRs, because the reviewer has to simultaneously review the feature request, as well as the refactorings. Stacking the diffs can help a lot here.
